FAQ

Common questions about our services, pricing, and security methodologies.

What industries do you specialize in?
We have extensive experience in Fintech, Healthcare, Shipping/Maritime, and Government sectors. However, our security principles are industry-agnostic.
Do you offer 24/7 monitoring?
Yes, our SOC operates 24/7/365. We have analysts working in shifts to ensure your infrastructure is never left unguarded.
How long does a penetration test take?
The duration depends on the scope (number of IPs, complexity of apps). A typical web app test takes 1-2 weeks, while a full red team operation can take 1-3 months.
Are you GDPR compliant?
Absolutely. We are a Greek company and fully adhere to EU GDPR regulations. We also help our clients achieve and maintain compliance.
What is your pricing model?
We offer both project-based pricing (e.g., for penetration tests) and subscription-based models for managed services (SOC, MDR). Contact us for a custom quote.
Can you help with incident response if we are not a current client?
Yes, we offer emergency incident response services. However, existing retainer clients receive priority handling and guaranteed response times.

Still have questions?
